title: Implement Biometric Authentication
description: Add fingerprint and Face ID authentication as an alternative login method for returning users who have previously logged in.
instructions:
Extend the login flow to support biometric authentication:

1. Add the local_auth package to enable biometric authentication
2. Check if biometrics are available on the device
3. Show a biometric login button only when credentials are stored and biometrics are available
4. Implement the biometric authentication flow that retrieves stored credentials
5. Handle biometric authentication failures gracefully
6. Allow users to enable/disable biometric login in settings

Create the following:
- BiometricService class to handle all biometric operations
- BiometricLoginButton widget that appears conditionally
- Settings toggle for enabling/disabling biometric login
- Proper error handling for various biometric failure scenarios

hints.text: Use the local_auth package and check both canCheckBiometrics and isDeviceSupported for proper availability detection.
Handle PlatformException with specific error codes like NotAvailable, NotEnrolled, and LockedOut for proper error messaging.
Only show the biometric button when all three conditions are met: device supports biometrics, user has stored credentials, and user has enabled biometric login.
